revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Lectures on the sacred poetry of the Hebrews; translated from the Latin of the Right Rev. Robert Lowth, D.D. Late Praelector of Poetry in the University of Oxford,..."
revision.text: Possibly: Lectures on the sacred poetry of the Hebrews; translated from the Latin of the Right Rev. Robert Lowth, D.D. Late Praelector of Poetry in the University of Oxford, and now Lord Bishop of London, by G. Gregory, F.A.S. author of Essays Historical and Moral. To which are added, the principal notes of Professor Michaelis, and notes by the translator and others. 2v. (London : Printed for J. Johnson, No. 72, St. Paul's Church-Yard, M.DCC.LXXXVII. [1787]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408673~S1
